request.description:
Get a list of addresses with their token statistics. The response will be sorted by the balance of the specified token (order_by) in the specified order (order_type).

Request Body Parameters:
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- page_size: Number of items per page (default: 150)
- order_type: Sort order, 'asc' or 'desc' (default: 'desc')
- order_by: Token to sort by (default: 'sol')
- tokens: Array of token addresses to include (default: ["sol", "So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112"])

response.name: Error Response - Invalid Order By

query.description: 排序方式，desc（降序）或 asc（升序），默认为desc

item.name: Auto Create Wash Map With Task

request.description:
自动创建洗币图谱和任务。

请求参数说明：
- projectId: 项目ID
- projectLabel: 项目标签
- mapType: 图谱类型，目前支持 "linear"
- mapParams:
  - rootLabel: 根节点标签
  - rootAddress: 根节点地址
  - count: 链路数量
  - depth: 每条链路的深度
- taskParams:
  - gas: gas 费用
  - token: 代币类型
  - decimals: 代币小数位数
  - amountArrary: 每条链路的金额数组，长度必须与 count 相同
  - endpoint: RPC 节点地址

响应示例：
```json
{
    "message": "创建成功",
    "data": {
        "task_manage_id": 1,
        "map_id": 1,
        "task_count": 12,
        "task_gas": 0.000005,
        "send_token": "sol",
        "token_decimals": 9,
        "task_amount": 10,
        "leaf_count": 4
    }
}
```

item.name: Auto Create Wash Map With Task V2

request.description:
自动创建洗币图谱和任务。

请求参数说明：
- projectId: 项目ID
- projectLabel: 项目标签
- mapType: 图谱类型，目前支持 "linear"
- mapParams:
  - rootLabel: 根节点标签
  - rootAddress: 根节点地址
  - count: 链路数量
  - depth: 每条链路的深度
- taskParams:
  - gas: gas 费用
  - token: 代币类型
  - decimals: 代币小数位数
  - amountArrary: 每条链路的金额数组，长度必须与 count 相同
  - endpoint: RPC 节点地址

响应示例：
```json
{
    "message": "创建成功",
    "data": {
        "task_manage_id": 1,
        "map_id": 1,
        "task_count": 12,
        "task_gas": 0.000005,
        "send_token": "sol",
        "token_decimals": 9,
        "task_amount": 10,
        "leaf_count": 4
    }
}
```

request.description: 根据池子ID获取交换记录，支持分页

获取项目的 AMM 池子持有者数据，包括池子本身、项目地址和散户的持有情况。

返回数据格式：
```json
{
    "pool": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "address": "pool_address",
            "pool_address": "pool_address",
            "base_mint": "base_token_address",
            "quote_mint": "quote_token_address",
            "last_slot": 123456789,
            "start_slot": 123456700,
            "last_timestamp": 1234567890,
            "start_timestamp": 1234567800,
            "end_signature": "end_tx_signature",
            "start_signature": "start_tx_signature",
            "base_change": 100.5,
            "quote_change": -50.25,
            "sol_change": -0.1
        }
    ],
    "project": [
        {
            "id": 2,
            "address": "project_address",
            "pool_address": "pool_address",
            "base_mint": "base_token_address",
            "quote_mint": "quote_token_address",
            "last_slot": 123456789,
            "start_slot": 123456700,
            "last_timestamp": 1234567890,
            "start_timestamp": 1234567800,
            "end_signature": "end_tx_signature",
            "start_signature": "start_tx_signature",
            "base_change": 50.25,
            "quote_change": -25.125,
            "sol_change": -0.05
        }
    ],
    "retail_investors": [
        {
            "id": 3,
            "address": "retail_address",
            "pool_address": "pool_address",
            "base_mint": "base_token_address",
            "quote_mint": "quote_token_address",
            "last_slot": 123456789,
            "start_slot": 123456700,
            "last_timestamp": 1234567890,
            "start_timestamp": 1234567800,
            "end_signature": "end_tx_signature",
            "start_signature": "start_tx_signature",
            "base_change": 25.125,
            "quote_change": -12.5625,
            "sol_change": -0.025
        }
    ]
}
```

List system commands with pagination and optional filters.

Query Parameters:
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- page_size: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- order_field: Field to order by (id|project_id|command_name|is_active|is_success|created_at|updated_at)
- order_type: Order direction (asc|desc)
- command_name: Filter by command name (LIKE search)
- is_active: Filter by active status (true|false)
- is_success: Filter by success status (true|false)
- project_id: Filter by project ID

Response includes pagination metadata.

Get the latest system command record (highest ID).

Returns the most recently created system command record based on ID in descending order. This endpoint does not require any parameters.

Useful for retrieving the most recent command execution status.

List system commands filtered by project_id with pagination.

Path Parameters:
- project_id: Project ID (required)

Query Parameters:
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- page_size: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- order_field: Field to order by (id|project_id|command_name|is_active|is_success|created_at|updated_at)
- order_type: Order direction (asc|desc)
- command_name: Filter by command name (LIKE search)
- is_active: Filter by active status (true|false)
- is_success: Filter by success status (true|false)

Response includes pagination metadata for all commands matching the project_id.

Get a specific system command record by ID.

Path Parameters:
- id: System command ID (required)

Returns the system command record with all fields including command_params and verify_params.

Create a new system command record.

Request Body:
- is_active (optional): Active status (boolean, default: true)
- project_id (optional): Project ID (uint, default: 0)
- command_name (optional): Command name (string, default: empty)
- command_params (optional): Command parameters as JSON object (jsonb)
- verify_params (optional): Verification parameters as JSON object (jsonb)
- is_success (optional): Success status (boolean, default: false)

Example command_params:
{
  "role_id": 1,
  "first_buy_amount": 87.5
}

Example verify_params:
{
  "project_id": 1,
  "pool_address": "2h3MDPYRtTRMUArzd3cab3EmPFWrFpA4dZWHhrDLgoyC"
}

Returns the created system command record with auto-generated ID and timestamps.

Update an existing system command record. All fields are optional (partial update).

Path Parameters:
- id: System command ID (required)

Request Body (all fields optional):
- is_active: Active status (boolean)
- project_id: Project ID (uint)
- command_name: Command name (string)
- command_params: Command parameters as JSON object (jsonb)
- verify_params: Verification parameters as JSON object (jsonb)
- is_success: Success status (boolean)

Only provided fields will be updated. Returns the updated system command record.

Delete a system command record by ID.

Path Parameters:
- id: System command ID (required)

Returns a success message upon successful deletion.

List system params with pagination and optional filters.

Query Parameters:
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- page_size: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- order_field: Field to order by (id|name|preset_id|is_active|created_at|updated_at)
- order_type: Order direction (asc|desc)
- name: Filter by name (LIKE search)
- is_active: Filter by active status (true|false)
- preset_id: Filter by preset ID
- preset_name: Filter by preset name (LIKE search)

Response includes pagination metadata.

Get a specific system params record by ID.

Path Parameters:
- id: System params ID (required)

Returns the system params record with all fields including params_config.

Returns the system params record with all fields including params_config.

Path Parameters:

Returns the system params record with all fields including params_config.

Create a new system params record.

Request Body:
- name (required): Parameter name (string, max 128 chars)
- is_active (optional): Active status (boolean, default: true)
- preset_id (optional): Preset ID (uint)
- preset_name (optional): Preset name (string, default: empty)
- params_config (optional): Parameter configuration as JSON object (jsonb)

Example params_config:
{
  "sort_type": "random",
  "max_buy_sol": 0.35,
  "min_buy_sol": 0.1
}

Returns the created system params record.

- preset_id: Preset ID (uint)
- preset_name: Preset name (string)
- params_config: Parameter configuration as JSON object (jsonb)

Only provided fields will be updated. Returns the updated system params record.
